inclusion.criterion: Male and female veterans at least 18 years of age.
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Ability to read and speak English (assessment instruments and therapy will be available only in English).
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: AHI> 5 on baseline home sleep study
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Agree to initiate automatically titrating continuous positive airway pressure (APAP) therapy.
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: Completion of clinic questionnaires during initial sleep evaluation
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Lack of English fluency. This will be determined when potential subjects are contacted by phone.
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Patients previously treated with positive airway pressure.
exclusion.label: not_met

notes: Patient has COPD, OSA and obesity hypoventilation syndrome. Daughter reports increased agitation and altered mental status x 2-3 days with O2 sats 60s-70s at home.
